item.title: Nix hackathon March 2017
item.description: Earlier this month Smarkets was being awesome and hosted our 2nd Nix hackathon. We had a fantasic crowd of smart people, and the Smarkets office was downright amazing. We had standing desks with extra monitors. The coffee was so thick that it was still strong in homeopathic doses. We even had smarties on tap.

item.title: NixOS security-updates update
item.description:
This weekend Nicolas Pierron (nbp on GitHub) came to London for a NixOS hackathon. He's been working on improving security updates in NixOS for a while. He's the author of the NixOS module system amongst other things. He has a successful track record of complex, tree-wide changes so if anyone can nail this, it's him.

The main output of our weekend is this blog post with his ideas.
